ru: Согните поднятую ногу и кистью той же стороны возьмитесь за голень.

ru: Плечевой сустав со стороны поднятой ноги подайте вперед, чтобы плечевые суставы расположились параллельно друг другу в горизонтальной плоскости.
en: Move the shoulder on the side of your raised leg forward, aligning both shoulders parallel to each other in a horizontal plane.
enSynonyms: Shift the shoulder corresponding to your lifted leg forward, ensuring both shoulders are parallel horizontally.
Advance the shoulder on the side of your elevated leg, keeping both shoulders level and parallel.
Push the shoulder aligned with your raised leg forward, maintaining a parallel alignment of both shoulders.
Guide the shoulder on the side of your lifted leg forward, so both shoulders are evenly aligned.
Adjust the shoulder on the side of your raised leg forward, creating a parallel and level alignment of both shoulders.

en: Pull your raised foot upwards even higher.
enSynonyms: Lift your elevated foot to a greater height.
Draw your lifted foot further upwards.
Extend your raised foot to a higher position.
Stretch your elevated foot upwards with more intensity.
